title: Yalancılar ve Mumları
overview: Elif, a widow and single mom, is still grappling with her husband's death. Ceyda is a wedding planner who never had time for a husband of her own, while Şebnem has a picture-perfect life, except that her struggle to conceive has left her marriage a shambles. Finally, there's Meliha, a successful psychiatrist and the most logical of the group – until she begins having an affair with one of her patients.
